de.fhtw.xgl.interpreter
Interface Widget

All Known Subinterfaces:
Button, Checkbox, Combobox, Container, Label, Menu, MenuBar, Textfield, Window
All Known Implementing Classes:
SwingButton, SwingCheckbox, SwingContainer, SwingLabel, SwingMenu, SwingMenuBar, SwingTextfield, SwingWindow
public interface Widget

Basic GUI-element. All widget are derived from this interface.

Author:
Sebastian Heide
